root.text:
WHAT ARE YOU PLANNING
TO DO THIS EVENING?

THIS EVENING I'M PLANNING TO
GO TO, UM, DINNER WITH FRIENDS

I THINK I'LL STAY HOME
AND HAVE MY DINNER.

SO WHAT ARE YOU GOING
TO DO THIS WEEKEND?

I AM GOING TO, UM, GO TO THE
PARK AND MAYBE SEE A MOVIE

AND, UH, WILL YOU BE
GOING WITH ANYONE?

UH, WITH A COLLEAGUE IN THE
OFFICE AND HER HUSBAND.

DO YOU HAVE ANY BIG
PLANS COMING UP?

UM, I DON'T HAVE MAJOR PLANS
COMING UP NEXT MONTH.

UM, NEXT MONDAY I WILL PROBABLY
BE IN THE OFFICE WORKING.

UM, AFTER WORK I'LL PROBABLY GO
OUT AND HAVE SOMETHING TO EAT

AND GO TO DINNER AND, UM,
COME HOME AND WATCH TV.
